CoreCommand.label: Command
CoreCommand.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

CorePermission.label: Permission
CorePermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

CoreCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
CoreCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

CoreMessage.value: $total $currency have been donated towards "$goal". $remaining $currency remaining to reach the goal.
CoreMessage.label: Message
CoreMessage.tooltip: Message that should be displayed when the user does uses this command by itself

addAliases.label: Aliases
addAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for the add command. Should not contain spaces.

addPermission.label: Permission
addPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

addCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
addCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

addGenerous.label: Viewers can contribute more than the target amount

addExample.label: Example usage (please do not change)
addExample.tooltip: Sample usage of this command. Please do not modify

addSuccess.value: Thank you, $user, for adding $contribution $currency to the pot. You've added $total_contribution $currency so far.
addSuccess.label: Success Message
addSuccess.tooltip: Chat message to send when the user's contribution was successful

addFailure.value: Sorry, $user. You only have $currency_available $currency available, so you cannot contribute $contribution $currency.
addFailure.label: Failure Message
addFailure.tooltip: Chat message to send when the user's contribution failed. (Contributing more currency than user has)

addGenerousMessage.value: Thank you for your generosity, $user, but the goal has already been reached.
addGenerousMessage.label: Failure Message
addGenerousMessage.tooltip: Chat message to send when the user's contribution failed. (Contributing more currency beyond goal)

commitAliases.label: Aliases
commitAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for this command. Should not contain spaces.

commitPermission.label: Permission
commitPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

commitCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
commitCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

commitSuccess.value: $user has committed and reset the currency pool.
commitSuccess.label: Message
commitSuccess.tooltip: Chat message to send when the pool has been reset

commitConfirmation.value: Are you sure you wish to reset the goal? Use this command again to confirm.
commitConfirmation.label: Confirmation Message
commitConfirmation.tooltip: Chat message to send informing the user to do the command a second time

commitExample.label: Example usage (please do not change)
commitExample.tooltip: Sample usage of this command. Please do not modify

goalAliases.label: Aliases
goalAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for the goal command. Should not contain spaces.

goalPermission.label: Permission
goalPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

goalCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
goalCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

goalClear.label: Setting goal should reset the pool?
goalClear.tooltip: If checked, using !command goal will reset the pool

goalExample.label: Example usage (please do not change)
goalExample.tooltip: Sample usage of this command. Please do not modify

goalSuccess.label: Message
goalSuccess.tooltip: Chat message to send when the goal has been changed

removeAliases.label: Aliases
removeAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for the remove command. Should not contain spaces.

removePermission.label: Permission
removePermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

removeCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
removeCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

removeModeratorOnly.label: Moderators can remove anyone's contribution?
removeModeratorOnly.tooltip: Whether moderators can refund any contributions, not just their own

removeExample.label: Example usage (please do not change)
removeExample.tooltip: Sample usage of this command. Please do not modify

removeSelfSuccess.label: Self Success
removeSelfSuccess.tooltip: Chat message to send when a contribution has been refunded to the user

removeSelfFailure.value: Sorry, $user, but you cannot refund $contribution $currency. You can refund a maximum of $total_contribution $currency
removeSelfFailure.label: Self Failure
removeSelfFailure.tooltip: Chat message to send when a refund failed. (User had not contributed requested refund)

removeOtherSuccess.label: Other Success
removeOtherSuccess.tooltip: Chat message to send when a contribution has been refunded to the user by a moderator

removeOtherFailure.value: Sorry, $user, but you cannot refund $contribution $currency to $target. You can refund a maximum of $total_contribution $currency
removeOtherFailure.label: Other Failure
removeOtherFailure.tooltip: Chat message to send when a moderator cannot refund currency. (User had not contributed requested refund)

targetAliases.label: Aliases
targetAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for the target command. Should not contain spaces.

targetPermission.label: Permission
targetPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

targetCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
targetCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

targetExample.label: Example usage (please do not change)
targetExample.tooltip: Sample usage of this command. Please do not modify

targetSuccess.value: $user has set the $currency pool target to $target $currency
targetSuccess.label: Message
targetSuccess.tooltip: Chat message to send when pool target has been updated

topAliases.label: Aliases
topAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for the top command. Should not contain spaces.

topPermission.label: Permission
topPermission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

topCooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
topCooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

topDefault.label: Default number of leaders
topDefault.tooltip: Default number of contributors to display if no number is specified

topExample.label: Example usage (please do not change)
topExample.tooltip: Sample usage of this command. Please do not modify

topMessage.label: Message
topMessage.tooltip: Chat message to send when displaying the top contributors

transferAliases.label: Aliases
transferAliases.tooltip: Comma separate list of aliases for the transfer command. Should not contain spaces.

OverlayApiToken.label: Streamlabs API Access Token
OverlayApiToken.tooltip: Streamlabs access token. Log into Streamlabs Dashboard -> API Settings -> API Tokens -> Your API Access Token
OverlayApiToken.group: API (WARNING: DO NOT SHOW ON STREAM)

OverlayStyle.label: Streamlabs goal style
OverlayStyle.tooltip: Which Streamlabs goal widget to copy style settings from

RefreshOverlay.label: Refresh Overlay
RefreshOverlay.tooltip: Manually refreshes the overlay. If you've changed overlay colors, please save first.
